LanguageData.Moyo_FakeTail.label: fake moyo tail
LanguageData.Moyo_FakeTail.description: A fake tail made of cloth. Helps keep balance.
LanguageData.Moyo_BionicTail.label: bionic moyo tail
LanguageData.Moyo_BionicTail.description: A binoic tail made with advanced technology. Superior to a natural tail in many ways.
LanguageData.Moyo_AdvancedHeart.label: abysstech heart
LanguageData.Moyo_AdvancedHeart.description: A bionic heart modified with abysstech. This particular phrosthethic part is desinged for moyos.
